attributes.action: Stop ALL government funding and support for the violent anti-fascist pressure group Unite Against Fascism (UAF)
attributes.additional_details:
In recent years, members of the anti-fascist pressure group Unite Against Fascism have brought about deplorable acts of violence at every "anti-fascist" protest they have turned up to, with many of its members having been arrested throughout the years.

Both the UAF and the government have never once condemned the violent nature of UAF members and the government still continues to support and fund what many people believe to be a group of violent thugs.

We call upon the government to stop supporting and funding this violent pressure group and publicly condemn their violent acts.
